about.title: Welcome to {{brand.shortName}}
about.tagline: Pints, momos, and matchday energy on Newmarket Road
description: A 1930s art-deco corner pub reinvented with a full Nepalese kitchen, proper pints, and HD sports just east of Cambridge city centre.
Grab sizzling mixed grills, Himali Lamb, or a Sunday roast before settling into our snugs, dining wing, or heated cabins.
Families, football fans, and food lovers all find a spot ‚Äî with wheelchair access, friendly staff, and a cosy fire when it‚Äôs cold.
features: Authentic Nepalese cuisine prepared by Nepali chefs
HD screens plus outdoor projector for big games
Heated private cabins and covered beer garden

milestones.title: Art-deco origin
milestones.copy: Corner local opens on Newmarket Road with curved glass frontage and timber snug rooms.

milestones.title: Nepalese kitchen
milestones.copy: Nepali chefs join the team, introducing momos, sizzlers, and Himalayan spice to pub classics.

hero.title: Plates that define {{brand.shortName}}
hero.description: Hand-pinched momos, sizzling mixed grills, and slow-braised curries crafted by our Kathmandu-born kitchen lead.
hero.quote: We marinate every skewer for 24 hours and finish with Nepali timmur for that citrus-pepper hit.

items.name: Chicken Rum Rum
items.description: House signature curry with tomato, ginger, and timmur pepper heat ‚Äî medium and addictive.

items.name: Himali Lamb
items.description: Slow-braised lamb in warming Himalayan spices with a velvety, aromatic sauce.

items.name: Khasi Ko Masu (Goat Curry)
items.description: Traditional goat curry simmered low-and-slow for deep flavour without overpowering heat.

items.name: House Mixed Grill
items.description: Sizzling platter of wings, tikka, seekh kebab, and king prawn ‚Äî perfect for sharing in the bar or cabins.

reviews.title: What Guests Say
reviews.subtitle: 800+ five-star shoutouts across TripAdvisor & Google prove that Himalayan grills and pub classics belong together.

hero.title: 4.7‚òÖ across 800+ reviews
hero.description: Families, football fans, and curry hunters rave about sizzling mixed grills, warm service, and heated cabins just outside central Cambridge.

spotlights.title: Food & Drink
spotlights.copy: Momos, Himali Lamb, mixed grills, and Sunday roasts arrive with cask ales and smoky timmur heat.

spotlights.title: Service & Atmosphere
spotlights.copy: Friendly Nepali-led team guides spice levels, keeps pints flowing, and knows regulars by name.

spotlights.title: Spaces
spotlights.copy: Art-deco snugs, heated cabins, and HD screens suit date nights, families, and derby days.

items.quote: Superb Himali Lamb Curry and friendly staff who helped us navigate the Nepalese dishes.
Perfect spot for a Cambridge reunion ‚Äî attentive team, great drinks, brilliant atmosphere.
Old pub with a twist. Nepalese curry was excellent and plenty of HD screens for the match.
Second time here ‚Äî same delicious curry and very reasonable prices for Cambridge.
Family-friendly pub; staff handled dietary requests and the fireplace made it extra cosy.
